alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 02 at 12:43AM MST until December 02 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Crosswinds may contribute to difficult driving conditions especially on east to west oriented routes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are accompanying a cold front. Winds behind the front are not as strong, but still gusting 30 to 40 mph.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
